original_text: God showed his prophets that his messages about these things were not really to help them. Instead, God sent his message to the prophets to help you. That message is the good news about Jesus Christ which you have now heard. God sent his Holy Spirit from heaven to help people to tell the good news to you. Even the angels would like to understand more about these things.
korean_text: 이 섬긴 바가 자기를 위한 것이 아니요 너희를 위한 것임이 계시로 알게 되었으니 이것은 하늘로부터 보내신 성령을 힘입어 복음을 전하는 자들로 이제 너희에게 알린 것이요 천사들도 살펴 보기를 원하는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: that his messages about these things
were not really to help them
sentences.korean_translation: 정말로 그들을 돕기 위한 것이 아니었습니다

sentences.original_text: to the prophets to help you
That message is the good news
God sent his Holy Spirit from heaven
to help people to tell the good news
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 복음을 전할 수 있도록 돕기 위해

sentences.original_text: to understand more about these things
